H0.text: how many countries in the world have scouts. 150

H1.text: how many countries in the world have scouts. 180

H2.text: how many countries in the world have scouts. 120

H3.text: how many countries in the world have scouts. 216

A5.text: As of 2019, there are over 46 million registered Scouts and as of 2020 9 million registered Guides around the world, from 216 countries and territories.

A6.text: In 2019, there were over 55 million Scouts and Guides in at least 155 countries.
